summary: The code includes the unistd.h library and defines a main function that uses the usleep function to pause execution for 5000 microseconds (5 milliseconds). The function returns an integer value of 0, indicating successful program termination.

details.comment: The code includes the unistd.h library and defines a main function that uses the usleep function to pause execution for 5000 microseconds (5 milliseconds). The function returns an integer value of 0, indicating successful program termination.
